metadata.name: Transcending silences
metadata.description:
International week of  Sign language 

This multiple exposure shot reflects the gestures of  sign language and its beautiful. Since I am representing for the deaf community, the challenges need to be addressed in NFT space. Sign language is the most suitable medium for deaf to express themselves . Due to lack of awareness about Sign language,  huge communication barrier is encountered but art/photography help us to make impact and express our idea and bridge the gap between deaf and non disabled communities. 

But Sign language is the foundation of our communication. It helps us to express our thoughts. 

Can you join us to learn Sign Language and make the difference

Editions : 30/30

Artist : Srivatsan Sankaran

Location : Chennai

Date : 23 Sept 2022

License : Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
